import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Scores(){const{sport,league}=useParams();// Get sport and league from URL params
const navigate=useNavigate();const[news,setNews]=useState(null);const[scores,setScores]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// API URLs for ESPN news and scoreboard
const newsUrl=`http://site.api.espn.com/apis/site/v2/sports/${sport}/${league}/news`;const scoreboardUrl=`http://site.api.espn.com/apis/site/v2/sports/${sport}/${league}/scoreboard`;useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{// Fetch both news and scoreboard data
const newsResponse=await fetch(newsUrl);const scoreboardResponse=await fetch(scoreboardUrl);if(!newsResponse.ok||!scoreboardResponse.ok){throw new Error('Error fetching data from ESPN');}// Parse JSON data
const newsData=await newsResponse.json();const scoreboardData=await scoreboardResponse.json();// Set the data into state
setNews(newsData.articles);setScores(scoreboardData.events);}catch(error){setError(error.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(sport&&league){fetchData();}},[sport,league]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Scores",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/'),className:"home-button",children:"Go to Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[sport.replace('_',' ').toUpperCase()," - ",league.toUpperCase()," News & Scoreboard"]}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{color:'red'},children:["Error: ",error]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"news-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"News"}),news?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:news.map((article,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:article.links.web.href,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:article.headline})},index))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No news available."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"scoreboard-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Scoreboard"}),scores?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"scoreboard",children:scores.map((event,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"game",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[event.homeTeam.name," vs ",event.awayTeam.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Start Time: ",new Date(event.date).toLocaleString()]}),event.status&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",event.status.description]})]},index))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No games scheduled."})]})]});}export default Scores;
